special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Spikefield enters, put a critical counter on target creature. [i](If it would deal damage, remove a critical counter and it deals twice that much instead.)[/i]
[b]2 Defense[/b] Stage 2
Creatures you control have haste.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
When Into Spikefield is defeated, it deals 4 damage to any nonbattle target.
